# NSAccessibilityColor

**Protocol**

A role-based protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary for an accessibility element to act as a color.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSAccessibilityColor
```

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityName**: Returns a localized description of the color for use in accessibility attributes.

## Images and Color

- **NSAccessibilityImage**: A role-based protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary for an accessibility element to act as an image.

## Conforming Types

- NSColor

items.description: Returns a localized description of the color for use in accessibility attributes.
